Class ProjectApplicationService

java.lang.Object
services.subservices.ProjectApplicationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectApplicationService
public class ProjectApplicationService extends Object implements IProjectApplicationService
Service class that handles all functionalities related to project applications submitted by applicants, including application submission, status updates, withdrawals, bookings, and eligibility checks. This class interacts with ProjectAppDB and ApplicantDB.

    • applyForProject

      public void applyForProject(Scanner sc, Applicant user, String selectedProjectName)
      Initiates the application process for a project, including room type selection and eligibility validation based on applicant's age and marital status.
      Specified by:
      applyForProject in interface IProjectApplicationService
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      user - The applicant submitting the application
      selectedProjectName - The name of the project to apply for

    • addApplication

      Adds a new project application to the database.
      Specified by:
      addApplication in interface IProjectApplicationService
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      userID - The NRIC of the applicant
      flatType - The flat type selected by the applicant

    • updateApplicationStatus

      project - The name of the project
      newStatus - The new application status

    • bookApplication

      public int bookApplication(String projectName, String userId)
      Books the application for a given applicant and project. Booking is only allowed for applications with status SUCCESSFUL.
      Specified by:
      bookApplication in interface IProjectApplicationService
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name
      userId - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      1 if booking is successful, 0 otherwise

      public ProjectApplication getApplicationByUserAndProject(String userId, String projectName)

      Parameters:

      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      The corresponding ProjectApplication, or null if not found

    • chooseFromApplicationList

      public ProjectApplication chooseFromApplicationList(Scanner sc, List<ProjectApplication> applications)
      Allows the user to choose a project application from a list. Optionally filters only PENDING applications.
      Specified by:
      chooseFromApplicationList in interface IProjectApplicationService
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      applications - The list of applications to choose from
      Returns:
      The selected ProjectApplication, or null if cancelled or invalid
